name: Phoca Restaurant Menu Block
author: Jan Pavelka ( Phoca )

sections.description:
Phoca Restaurant Menu Block is a Gutenberg plugin that works as a parent block for the Phoca Restaurant Menu Groups Items Block. This plugin allows users to create menus for various establishments, such as restaurants, cafeterias, fast-food joints, school canteens, buffets, bars, clubs, snack bars, winerooms, and more, directly within their WordPress articles.

With Phoca Restaurant Menu Block, you can easily organize and display daily menus for your restaurant or food establishment. Whether you need to showcase different dishes for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or offer daily specials, this plugin simplifies the process, making it effortless to create and manage your menus.

Please note that there is an issue with the Gutenberg block feature: when blocks are duplicated, the data entered into the form fields of the duplicated block can overwrite the data in the source block. To work around this issue, you have two options:

  1. Do not use the duplicate feature. Instead, use Copy function – create a new block and copy the content from the original block,
  2. Or, after duplicating a block, save (update) the article and reload the site. This action will ensure that all form fields in the duplicated block remain independent of the source block.

For more information, see Phoca documentation website
or ask question in Phoca Forum.

Demo: Phoca Restaurant Menu WP Block Demo website

Child block: Phoca Restaurant Menu Groups Items Block

Video Guide:
sections.installation:
To install the Phoca Restaurant Menu Block plugin, follow these steps:

  1. Log in to your WordPress admin panel.
  2. In the left sidebar, go to Plugins and click on Add New.
  3. In the search bar, type “Phoca Restaurant Menu Block” and locate the plugin in the search results or click on “Upload Plugin” button and select Phoca Restaurant Menu block ZIP package.
  4. Click the Install Now button.
  5. Once the installation is complete, click the Activate button to activate the plugin.
  6. You can now use the Phoca Restaurant Menu Daily Menu Block in your Gutenberg editor to create and manage menus for your restaurant or food establishment.
  7. Don’t forget to install the inner block Phoca Restaurant Menu Groups and Items block.
sections.faq:
How do I create a menu using this plugin?

To create a menu, add a new block in your Gutenberg editor, select the “Phoca Restaurant Menu Block,” and configure the menu items, descriptions, and prices as needed.

Can I use this plugin for a restaurant with multiple locations

Yes, you can use this plugin to create menus for restaurants with multiple locations. Simply add a new block for each location and customize the menu accordingly.

I encountered an issue with duplicated blocks overwriting data. How can I resolve this?

Please refer to the “Description” section above for instructions on how to resolve the issue when duplicating blocks.
